title: The Favorite Son
description: In this Dateline classic, when a small business owner and his bride are found dead just a few months after their wedding, police start looking into stories about a nasty family feud. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 8, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
